question: Dinyar Contractor, who recently passed away, was associated with which of the following field?
explanation: Dinyar Contractor, who recently passed away, was associated with acting. He was born in Mumbai. In the year 2019, he was awarded Padma Shri. Some of the films, he appeared are Baazigar, Khiladi, 36 China Town, Chori Chori Chupke Chupke.
